answerText: Galileo Galilei [accept either underlined portion][10] This seminal work by Nicholas Copernicus outlined his theory of the heliocentric universe. It was placed on the index of forbidden books initially and failed to sell very well.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Penn and Wake Forest | 7 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Identify these things about the history of the Heliocentric model of the solar system, for 10 points each: [10] This man was censured and placed under house arrest by the inquisition for espousing the Heliocentric theory in his Dialogue Concerning Two Chief World Systems. He also discovered the four largest moons of Jupiter.
